idea-plugin.name: TcpTunnelJ
idea-plugin.description: TcpTunnelJ is a practical tool designed to function as a TCP tunnel, providing support for network development. It enables developers to observe and intercept TCP connections, presenting the captured data in an accessible format directly within the IDE. This plugin is a refined version of the original TunnelliJ plugin (available at TunnelliJ GitHub Repository), incorporating new features and enhancements to improve usability and efficiency.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
What's New in Version 0.5.0

  • Improved TCP tunnel functionality
  • Enhanced UI for better user experience
  • New notification system for updates
  • Support to text based socket communication
